00027 #define LED0 5
00028 #define LED1 6
00029 #define LED2 7
00030 
00031 RESSOURCE_LIST_LOAD(ressources_list);

00033 // Declaration of the ressource
00034 RESSOURCE_INIT(temperature);
00035 RESSOURCE_INIT(brightness);
00036 RESSOURCE_INIT(led0);
00037 
00038 void setLed0(int val){
00039   if(val) HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_UP(PORTB, LED0);
00040   else    HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_DOWN(PORTB,LED0);
00041 }
00042 
00043 int getLed0(){
00044   return HARDWARE_DIGIT_GET(PORTB, LED0);
00045 }
00046 
00047 RESSOURCES_INIT(){
00048   /* I2C Sensor interface*/
00049   configureTemperature();
00050 }
00051 
00052 // Connection between the driver API and the REST API
00053 RESSOURCES_LOADER(){
00054 
00055         RESSOURCE_UNIT(brightness,lux);
00056         RESSOURCE_GET(brightness, &getLight);
00057         RESSOURCE_MIN(brightness, 0);
00058         RESSOURCE_MAX(brightness, 255);
00059 
00060         RESSOURCE_UNIT(temperature,celcius);
00061         RESSOURCE_GET(temperature, &getTemperature);
00062         RESSOURCE_MIN(temperature, 0);
00063         RESSOURCE_MAX(temperature, 200);
00064 
00065         RESSOURCE_UNIT(led0,boolean);
00066         RESSOURCE_GET(led0,&getLed0);
00067         RESSOURCE_SET(led0,&setLed0);
00068         RESSOURCE_MIN(led0, 0);
00069         RESSOURCE_MAX(led0, 1);
00070 
00071 }
